item.title: My First Coding Dojo as Organizer
item.description: My first coding dojo at work as an organizer Today I organized my first coding dojo at work with the help of a colleague. We both had almost no previous experience of this kind of event, I only had two as a participant (an event storming kata and a global day of code retreat). I «try to» practice TDD as much as possible but I am not a specialist either.
